Rolly Crump ... Roland Fargo Crump (February 27, 1930 – March 12, 2023) was an American animator and designer noted particularly for his work as a Disney ...
Rolly Crump joined the animation department of the Walt Disney Studios in 1952. He was hired as an in-between artist and rose to the role of assistant.
